differences.gitbook: We agreed that a reaction has to have a comment when it's an objection and if the consent is yes without any comment, we assume the consenter agrees with the policy hypothesis - If the reaction is Abstain, then they also have to add a comment - When adding a policy to GitBook, we agreed to add link to the Discord thread IF rule is accepted
